title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript modules to showcase my work and experiments.

title: Data Visualization Poster
description: A poster exploring chart design principles and typography through data-driven visuals.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A web app that suggests recipes based on available ingredients using a simple ingredient-matching algorithm.

title: Study Planner
description: A study schedule planner that helps students manage their time effectively with reminders and task tracking.

title: Map Explorer
description: An interactive map built with GeoJSON and Leaflet.js to visualize global data patterns.

title: API Dashboard
description: A dashboard that fetches and visualizes public API data with dynamic updates and minimal design.

title: Markdown Notes
description: A note-taking app with Markdown support and local storage to save notes between sessions.

title: Color Palette Tool
description: A simple color tool that helps designers mix and preview harmonious color palettes.

title: UX Redesign Teardown
description: A usability analysis and redesign proposal for a popular website, focusing on accessibility and user flow.

title: CSV Cleaner
description: A lightweight Python-based web tool that cleans and normalizes messy CSV data for analysis.

title: Chart Library Demo
description: A comparison of multiple JavaScript charting libraries through the same dataset and visualization types.

title: A/B Testing Report
description: A simulated A/B test case study summarizing findings and visualizations with charts and data tables.
